<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Change Client</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/backend/api/clients/{client_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://api.fotbo.com

Change  a specific client identified by ID.
